1.content:
"This does not look like the pie in the recipe of the cooking book." you said as you finished to cook a pie for a contest. "I think that... this pie will not work." and you threw the pie to the garbage.

"What can I do now?" you thought. Finally you realized that you could ask for some help to the Care Bears. They always seem to be glad helping other kids. Even you knew how to get to the so called Care-a-Lot. (You only have to think in a cloud and from Care-a-Lot land will automatically come a cloud).

You got out of your house and thought about the cloud that would carry you to Care-a-Lot land. A cloud in a shape of a car came flying to your direction. You jumped inside of it and it automatically returned to its original place. You noticed the rainbow entrance and you thought in stopping there first to greet the Care Bears. You jumped out and landed in the rainbow just to get zapped by a light. You blackened for a minute.

"I told you this thing was malfuctioning" said Tenderheart Bear.

"I was trying to make a defense machine so that no bad person can come here. It would automatically do that" said Grumpy Bear, creator of the machine.

"But why making a shrinking machine?"

"To... "minimize" their actions?" said Grumpy Bear.

"Yeah sure. I bet you fix it to shoot automatically" said Tenderheart Bear very confident about his words.

"Of course I will." said Grumpy offended and kicking the machine. The machine crumbled and fell apart.

"Maybe if you ask Bright Heart... he might tell you what to build next" said Tenderheart sarcastically. "The only good part of all this is that it did not hit anyone... like many other times."

"What are you complaining? You have been enjoying those "accidental cases" and many others that have found them" said Grumpy

"And you too. Remember not to... finish them all until you fix that machine" said Tenderheart.

"Yeah yeah. I need to think in a better machine also" said Grumpy returning to his house.

When you waked up, you noticed that the entrance to Cara-a-Lot land was somewhat far. You walked... and then ran to it. It took you about 10 minutes to arrive. You thought that something was wrong and you walked to the central fountain of the plaza.

When you arrive you found yourself in front of... a 30 feet tall fountain!!! "Why making a fountain so tall?" you thought. Then you felt a shake like almost being in an earthquake. "Earquake? In the clouds?" You fell backwards and you got stunned when you saw... a 30 feet tall Care Bear. "What is going on here? Why is everything so big?"

After some time you realized that you have shrunk to 3 inches tall. "Great. I came for help to solve my problems and then I get bigger ones" you complained. You decide to climb the fountain and to get the attention of a Care Bear. You climbed it and when you reached the top. you began to think in a plan to get their attention. However you were not aware about how close you were from a Care Bear.

Which Care Bear/Cousin was?

1) The bear that complains more than any other Care Bear. Maybe it is because he has to do all the work of a mechanic and an inventor. That is why he is somewhat hungry most of the times. The only thing that he does not complains is the flavor and kind of the food he eats.

2)Who better to solve your problems than the smartest Cousin of all Care-a-Lot? He surely will find a solution for your problem... unless he gets a mental block due lack of food. But do not worry; he does not need much food to start thinking again... just a little snack solves the problem.

3)Power can go to the heads of the leaders. This not his case, as he considers the same as the others... of course of the same size. He incites everyone to be the most caring and helper that they could be. It is a shame he does not shows that when he is hungry.

You saw in front of you a giant blue bear with a tummy symbol of a dark cloud with raindrops. He had a grumpy expression in his face like always. Still, he seemed to be concerned about you and... your little problem.

"What happened to you?" he asked.

"I do not know. The last thing I remember is a light coming towards me... then I waked up like this" you said.

*Great. Another victim* thought Grumpy. "Well, I suppose that I have to do something for you. Come with me, my little sna... I mean friend" He picked you gently with his paws and carrying you to his house. when you arrived you noticed the house was a bit messy and full of weird stuff and machines.

"Being and inventor and a mechanic... it is a nuisance but someone has to do it." he said.

"Do you think in all these machines?" you asked.

"Most of them. Some others are inventions of the others, specially Bright Heart. God, he needs to relax a little sometimes"

He took to the kitchen of his house and put in the counter. He sat in a chair and looked at you.

"What I am gonna do with you?" he said "But where are my manners? You are new here, my name is Grumpy Bear."

"Nice to meet you. And about my problem... Can you help me?" you asked.

"Mmm... that depends if I am in the mood. Right now I am not in the mood to think in a growing machine." said Grumpy with his habitual enthusiasm.

"I doesn't matter. I can wait." you said.

"You are not like other humans that want things in a moment or in a short time. I like you" said Grumpy changing his face in a happy one.

"Besides we can talk about my other problem... the reason that is why I came here."

"Of course yes"

"I was hoping if you could teach me how to make a fine pie" you said timidly.

"Pie, huh? Well... I am not professional; but I know how to make a delicious apple pie" said Grumpy proudly.

"That sounds delicious" you said. "And I am rather hungry right now"

"It is good that you mentioned the hunger." said Grumpy as he approached you with a bizarre look in his face "Because I am hungry too." his tone was deep.

"So then... what would you like?" you asked a bit scared.

"Well...

111.content:
"What about me? Well... I suppose I just want a little candy" you said. Grumpy did not said nothing. He was just... watching you. You looked to the sides and back of you.

"What are you looking at?" you asked, a bit uncomfortable.

"I was just watching my snack... it looks exquisite" said Grumpy licking his lips.

"But where is it? I can't see it"

"Naive and exquisite. That is how I like them most" said chuckling a little.

"What do you...?" you began to say before realizing that he was seeing you. There was a big, deep and terrifying silence in the room.

"You finally realized it?" said Grumpy with a evil grin in his face.

"Why?" you asked as you fell backwards and struggled.

"You see..." said Grumpy blocking your escape with his paw "... we Care Bears have taste many things and they were delicious... but one day we taste something... different"

"And that was?" you asked.

"Meat. Pure and delicious human meat. It was the best we have ever taste"

"But how...?"

"I happened days ago. I was working on a machine to shrunk any villain that came here to cause troubles... and we accidentally hit two kids that really affected them. After that we tried to help them... but"

"Let me guess you tasted them..." you said.

"In a manner of speaking, yes. Me and Tenderheart tasted one kid... by "accident" if you want to see it like that. Both fell on a bowl of chocolate and... I cleaned it and so did Tenderheart. Man, I wish I could swallow them again"

"You are mad." you shouted.

"Maybe... but it is what you call "survival of fittest." After that more "accidents" happened and it seems that others have found other humans also. They haven't tell anything to anyone; but I know what they do to them. OK, enough talk. It's meal time" said Grumpy closing his paw around you and lifting you in the air.

"Wait, you don't have to do this" you shouted. Grumpy did not paid attention.

"I...know there still heart in you. Maybe we haven't meet each other but I heard about the good actions you and to other children." Grumpy licked his lips and opened his mouth.

"Please, I am not edible at all. Please, I know that you are good and you will have the heart to make a good choice. Please... see inside of you" you pleaded with tears.

The result was...

1111.content:
For a moment, Grumpy stopped. You sighed in relief and you thought that he reconsidered his decision. He looked at you and sighed.

"Humans are always the same. Pleading and looking pathetic whenever something like this happens" said Grumpy. "Anyway, you conquered my heart, so I will make you a little favor"

"You will not eat me right?" you said.

"No. I will promise that I will not chew you" said closing his eyes and smiling. You became pale of fear and tried to break free from his paw. He just chuckled a little and finally said:

"Persistent, as I see. Well I suppose that we have to hurry this up, little girl. So... inside you go" said opening his mouth again and throwing you inside. He began to savor you and enjoying it.

You were violently carried to one cheek to another. Then it stopped. "Will he let me out?" you thought with a little ray of hope in your mind. Your hope broke, when you felt carried to his throat. You tried to hold on his tongue but it was too slippery and you slide down to his stomach. With loud gulp, Grumpy finished his little snack.

"Gosh. I found the first food that I cannot complain about anything. It was so perfect... and sweet. How I wish they would be more" he said patting his belly. Then he burped and chuckled a little

"Sorry. Oh, well I have to get to work again. I will rebuild the machine, so we can have... more accidents" said leaving his house.

About you? Well... I suppose building things needs energy that anyone can get from eating. I think this was your case.

Grumpy got out of the house and you decided...

12.content:
You tried to find somebody to help you out... Unfortunately for you, no one was aware of your presence. Time passed and you were still walking on the fountain, trying to get someone's attention. Finally you gave up and rest for a while.

"How is it possible that no one notices me?" you thought.

You heard something about a forest that was aside from Care-a-Lot. Maybe you would have better luck in there. You climb down the fountain and proceed to walk there. But there was a big detail you did not think about... the distance to the forest. Even though it was somewhat near for the Care Bears... for you it was almost like crossing a country from coast to coast.

You were half of the way when you thought it was a bad idea to continue... "What was I thinking? Who would live in that forest?" But you could not go back. The reason? Because it was already evening... Like 6:30 P.M. "Maybe I will find a refuge in the forest" you thought. You proceeded to the forest.

By the time you reached it it was night... a real dark one. "This place looks not so nice at night" you said as you could not see anything. Still you walked forward tying to find some place to spend the night... until you stumbled with something. It was a pencil.

"Why is this here?" you asked, cleaning yourself. You grabbed it... then a strange sound was heard. You were scared to hell when you heard that there was a voice whispering something. A silhouette was seen going from tree to tree.

"Hello? Anybody there?" you asked. No answers was given, just there was more whispering. Then the shadow was approaching you.

What did you do?

122.content:
When you finally reacted... you ran to nearby tree. You looked back and saw the figure approaching the pencil. At first it was a shadow... then the moonlight appeared, its light was weak but strong enough to reveal the shadow's identity. It was a purple raccoon... he had a light-bulb in his white tummy. The moonlight increased a little and now you could see the forest a bit more clearly.

"Now I see why he could move so fast... Raccoons can see in the dark... I think he is one of the Care Bear Cousins. He might help me" you thought as you got out and began to walk towards him. But a hand pulled you backwards. The raccoon turned his head and heard the sound. Finally, he concluded: "At last... five. I was waiting for that number... Now can I find them"

"Wait what are you doing?" you asked.

"Do not make any noise. We almost get there" said the male figure.

"Where?" Your question was answered when you saw an empty tree... inside there were another three kids. He pushed you inside and he entered while blocking the entrance. Inside was illuminated as well.

"What is this? Who are you?" you asked.

"We are kids like you..." said one.

"We came here for help..." said another. "But I think that was a bad idea"

"So then why you didn't asked for help to the Care Bears or the Cousins? I bet they can help"

"No... that is one bad idea" said the last one.

"Why? Aren't they suppose to help?"

"Only people that is of their size. But us... well... it is better that you do not know" said the boy who drag you.

"Why... do they do something... wrong?"

"*Wrong?* That word is a bit short... Since the accident with the shrink and the victims of its effects... they... well... began to do something really awful things to the kids that got zapped"

"What... what do they do to them...?" then you were interrupted by a giant paw that came towards you and the others. It grabbed a kid and it went. You and the other four thought it was the opportunity to escape. But in the retreat the raccoon grabbed another two kids. The only ones left were you and the boy. He told you to ran as far away from the forest as you could. He stayed to distract the raccoon... You both ran in different directions. You looked back and the raccoon staying still and that taking out a little notebook and writing something.

"What a time for writing" you thought and continued running. You reached the border of the forest and believe that you were free... when suddenly the raccoon appeared in front of you!!!

"No way... how did you got here so fast?" you asked, perplexed.

"I just calculated the others speed and yours one... then the distances of reach and it was easy to bring the other to a point where I could catch him and to prevent you from escaping" said the raccoon as he grabbed you and put you in a jar along with the others.

"He calculated those things so quickly? He must be a smart one" you concluded.

"Now... I will take you to my home. It is a bit late and I need some rest" he said. Then he took you to a little house that looked more like an architect's working place. There were a lot of blueprints of strange machines. Then the raccoon sighed and said "I cannot think when I am hungry...So would like a midnight snack" You turned pale when you heard that...

The raccoon opened the jar and grabbed one of the kids. It was a girl. "No please... do not it!!! I-I just came here to befriend you" she begged.

"How sweet of your part... But I cannot avoid it... but do not worry I do not chew or bite the food" he said and tossed her in his mouth and swallowed her quickly. You and the others were in silence, terrified of watching the event.

The raccoon belched and chuckled a little "Sorry... You know... I really like your taste" he said. "I think tomorrow I will have another snack"

"Why?" you asked, with tears. "Why did you do it?"

"There, there, little girl. If you are good you will be the last one" he said, while putting the jar in a table and going to bed. "I think I forgot to introduce myself... I am Bright Heart Raccoon... enjoy your stay in my house" ans he went to sleep.

You and the others could not sleep that night... not if you knew that one of you would be the next.

You looked behind; but there was no one. "It is strange. I swear that I heard someone telling me something" you blinked and when you opened your eyes... you fell in you back when from nowhere a giant sky blue rabbit appeared in front of you. She had a heart with wings in her tummy and was carrying a little bag in her paw.

"When did you...?" you asked stunned.

"I just stopped to help you. I am coming from the store for supplies" said the rabbit.

"Well, that was fast" you said.

"Do you think that was fast? I will show you, little boy. Come with me" said putting her free paw in the mountain. You stepped over it and she told you while closing it: "Close your eyes"

When you opened you looked around and you noticed... you were not in the fountain anymore. Now you were in a some kind of burrow with wooden furniture.

"We... we are not in the fountain anymore."

"What? When...? How... did...?" you said. An this time you were more scared than stunned.

"Try it. It is delicious" she said happily and eating it.

"What kind of animal is her...? She is not normal." you thought. You ate the salad "Hey, this is pretty good" you said.
